name: Dead by Daylight: The Last Breath
name_original: Dead by Daylight: The Last Breath
description: The Last Breath is the first Chapter for Dead by Daylight. It provides a glimpse of the effect of insanity in its purest and most violent form, as players gets to visit the asylum Crotus Prenn. You’ll also meet a new Killer, the Nurse, and the Survivor Nea Karlsson.
